The video was published on Facebook on M: 2020 and has been viewed over 10,000 times and shared almost 200 times.
The video shows an empty church with pho: 3. The claim is accompanied by a screenshot of the misleading post with an Indonesian-language caption that falsely translates to English as "The video below is a story that happened in Italy. When the church reopened, it turned out that almost all of its congregants have died due to COVID..."
A reverse image search using a keyframe: 2020, on the Facebook page of Salem Baptist Church in Mississippi, indicating that the video does not depict an Italian church.
